General.Name: J.S.P. Property Public Company Limited
General.Description: JSP Pharmaceutical Manufacturing (Thailand) Public Co., Ltd. develops, produces, and distributes conventional medicines, traditional medicines, herbal products, and dietary supplements in Thailand. It also provides contract manufacturing, research and development, packaging, and pharmaceutical and dietary supplement registration services, as well as offers cleaning products, such as hand sprays and pharma sanitizers. The company was founded in 1954 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
